scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n web,electron "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on http://localhost:1420 && cd electron && npm run dev
scripts.dev:rust: source ~/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null || true && cargo watch -x check -x test
scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:web && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:rust:dev && npm run build:web && npm run build:electron
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:rust && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:rust: source ~/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null || true && cargo clippy --workspace -- -D warnings && cargo fmt --all -- --check
scripts.lint:web: cd web && npm run lint && npm run check
scripts.clean: source ~/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null || true && cargo clean && rm -rf web/dist && rm -rf electron/dist && rm -rf electron/out
scripts.package: npm run build && cd electron && npm run package
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.docs: npm run docs:rust && npm run docs:web
